title: Thai Green Curry
method: Cut chicken thighs into long thin slices. Mix with 1 tbsp curry paste and season with salt
Heat 1 tbsp oil in a pan, add chicken and fry for 5 mins until cooked through. Transfer cooked chicken to a plate
Add remaining oil to pan and fry onions for 10 mins until softened. Transfer to plate

Scoop top third (super creamy top part) of both cans of coconut milk into pan. Heat over medium low heat and slowly bring to a simmer until the water and fat separate. Add curry paste and stir fry for 3 mins
Add onions back into pan followed by the rest of the coconut milk and fish sauce. Stir the mixture and bring to a boil
Add chicken back into pan, bring to boil then reduce heat to a simmer
Add sugarsnap peas into curry, stir for 1 minute then remove pan from heat. Serve with rice
notes: Add bamboo shoots with the sugarsnap peas
Can use galangal instead of ginger
